getFileExtension

public static final java.lang.String getFileExtension(java.io.File file,
                                                      boolean includeDelimiter)
Return the extension part given file name. For example, if the name of the file is "foo.bar", ".bar" will be returned if includeDelimiter is true, or "bar" will be returned if includeDelimiter is false; otherwise, if no extension is specified in the file name, empty string is returned instead of null.

Parameters:
file -
includeDelimiter -
Returns:
the extension or an empty string if nothing is found

appendFileNameWithGivenExtension

public static final java.io.File appendFileNameWithGivenExtension(java.io.File file,
                                                                  java.lang.String extension,
                                                                  boolean extensionIncludesDelimiter)
This function will return the file with the given extension. If it already contains, return immediately.

Parameters:

extension -
extensionIncludesDelimiter -
Returns:
the File object contains the right file name with the given extension.
